Processes.Name: Copy a Single file from Fileshare to SFTP
Processes.Description: This Process will read a file from the fileshare, and move it without any processing to an SFTP location.

the file from a fileserver.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1rvtlb7" sourceRef="Activity_08ieb5j" targetRef="TextAnnotation_14sil70" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40"><bpmn2:text>Throw an exception if result of "Read File Contents from SFTP Server" was null, or the size of the file is less than 0 bytes.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1xmlpvh" sourceRef="Event_0ou2vf3" targetRef="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40" /><bpmn2:group id="Group_168041r" categoryValueRef="CategoryValue_0ilgsb4" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_146nmm3"><bpmn2:text>Writing the file to SFTP server.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:textAnnotation
